        public void getMessage(java.lang.String readLine,
                       java.io.PrintWriter out)
        The method define the Vehicle behaviour.
        Specified by:
        getMessage in interface CommunicationInterface
        Parameters:
        readLine - If it starts with WRITE then a new tag will be created, else if it starts with a READ then the first tag stored will be read.
        out - OK or ERROR message is returned.
